attributes.action: Awarness And More Media Coverage and Support For Our Missing and Their Families
attributes.additional_details:
Missing Adults and Children in the UK.
What We Would Like To Change Is The Appalling Figures Of The Missing People In Our Country. Every Missing Person Is Vulnerable As Are Their Families,  Our Missing Are Not Absent They Are Missing, If Our Media Had Supplement’s  In Our Papers Of Our Missing  More People Would Be Aware Of  What Happens In Our Country And All Our Missing Adults and Children's  Families May Get The Voice and Support That Is Desperately Needed., And Our Public Would Be Made More Aware Of What Happens In Our Every Day Lives Eyes Will Be Opened More Missing May Be Found And Families Will Not Be Left In Silence

rejection.details: One for the newspapers to reply to - Gvt can't tell them what to publish.
